title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind causing chaos in Gotham.

title: The Matrix
plot: A hacker discovers the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion against machines.

title: John Wick
plot: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down gangsters who killed his dog.
